What you get

Managed Infrastructure
Leverage Shipped Brain's fully managed infrastructure - model instances that scale for any needs with no extra charge. Manage your models with our powerful tool.
Deployment & Serving
Focus on building amazing ML models. Deploy fully managed and scalable ML models with one click and no extra code. Every model gets its unique standardized API endpoint.
Distribution
Make your models available worldwide across any platform. Empower users with your ML and start building your interactive data science portfolio.
Monetization
Earn money every time someone uses or subscribes to your models. We handle worldwide payment processing.
